title: Auto Rickshaw
description: An auto rickshaw, often referred to as a tuk tuk. This motorized version of a cycle rickshaw is used for transport in many regions of the world. Generally this emoji has three wheels and open sides without doors.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the auto-rickshaw emoji presents a cheerful and colorful rendition of this iconic three-wheeled vehicle, often depicted in a bright yellow or red.  Apple's signature glossy 3D shading gives the vehicle a polished, almost toy-like appearance, emphasizing its rounded forms and smooth surfaces.  This emoji evokes a sense of adventure, travel, and perhaps a touch of nostalgia, commonly used when discussing journeys or transportation in bustling locales.
